To provide evidence for a direct effect of methylational status on <extra_id_0> IRF-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter activity we performed reporter gene assays with <extra_id_0> IRF-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter constructs before and after their in vitro methylation .
A complete methylation of these constructs was checked via restriction assays with methylation-sensitive endonucleases ( Figure 5A ) .

Intriguingly , methylation of the <extra_id_0> IRF-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter significantly decreased promoter activity in <extra_id_0> IRF-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - positive SD-1 cells by 85.0 % ( Figure 5B ) .
